definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: He has improved greatly at piano playing after a year's further study.
sentences.chinese: 經過一年的深造，他的鋼琴水平大有進益。

sentences.english: Compare them with the bett'ring of the time.
sentences.chinese: 拿它們比較受於時代的進益。
